title: Suzette Creperie and Bar
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Catering, European, French, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cheery nook creperie earns buzz for its range of sweet & savory crepes served in a relaxed ambiance, with a separate vegan menu with many choices. Many other menu items are vegetarian and can be made vegan by using vegan batter. Also has a gluten free batter. Serves a variety of local teas, coffee, n/a house drinks, espressos and has a full bar. Brunch on weekends 9:00 am-2:00 pm.
